backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing task management CRUD operations with access control, including task creation, updates, deletion, and status-based queries. Enforces user and admin permissions for all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (authentication, task CRUD, responsive design) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components for authentication, task management UI, forms, modals, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Task Management Application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with authentication guard, header with TaskFlow branding, conditional rendering of login prompt or task management interface, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskForm.t: Collapsible form component for creating tasks with title, description, status selector, and date picker, featuring validation and success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/DeleteTaskConfir: Alert dialog component for confirming task deletion with task title display and loading state during deletion operation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskModal.ts: Modal dialog component for editing existing tasks with form fields for title, description, status, and due date, using React Hook Form and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity, with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup that prompts for a name and cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/components/TaskItem.tsx: Card component displaying individual task details with status badges, due date indicators, and action buttons for editing, deleting, and quick status changes.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Main task list view component with status filtering dropdown that displays tasks in a responsive grid layout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling identity changes and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile and task management operations, including queries for fetching data and mutations for creating, updating, and deleting tasks with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes, spacing, and design tokens for the application's visual system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH color space, container settings, typography, animations, and extended theme tokens for the design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features (authentication, CRUD operations, responsive design) and pending feature requests for a task management application with Internet Identity integration.
